title: Flights & Flatbread with Truchard Vineyards
description:
Join us on Tuesday, August 5, from 4–8 PM at Whispering Vine Fourth St. for a special Flights & Flatbread tasting with Truchard Vineyards, one of Napa’s pioneering family wineries with deep ties to Reno. Enjoy a lineup of estate-grown wines and a flatbread while hearing stories from Anthony Truchard II, General Manager and son of founder Tony Truchard, who practiced medicine right here in Reno before starting the winery.

Tasting Fee: $35 (includes wine flight and flatbread)

Reserve a Table

Featured Wines:

• Truchard Estate Cabernet Sauvignon 2022 – Luscious and layered with raspberry, plum, cassis, and hints of cedar and vanilla.

• Truchard Syrah 2022 – Dark and full-bodied with blackberry, cherry, espresso, and black pepper on a velvety, structured finish.

• Truchard Pinot Noir 2023 – Silky and expressive with black cherry, pomegranate, rhubarb, and sweet vanilla.

• Truchard Chardonnay 2023 – Bright and tropical with pineapple, Meyer lemon, quince, and white flowers.

Enjoy a relaxed evening with a Napa favorite—wine, food, and family legacy all in one place.
